name: Space Mania
overview: A Galaga\Galaxian style single screen shooter where you try to destroy the aliens that move in waves. You are the last survivor of the lunar base GERXI 21 and now the hordes of aliens are attacking! Your task is to repel them for as long as possible. Your weapon is a ground-to-air laser cannon with which you have to hit as many enemies as you can while being careful not to be hit by one of them, as you would lose a life. If you successfully complete the game you will need to reload to play again. Published in Italy as Invasori in both Hit Parade C64 n.67 (Maggio 1992) and in Special Program n.84 (febbraio 1992).
